content:
Nompin‡µçrottam-maddhye vannu
Athyaasannam -mashihaayude haashaa
Vijnyanmaare! Ningall sothsaa-ham yathnichu
Makudatthin pathiyaam, eka-suthan tha-
Nnuththhaanam moolam-nithyajeevan-mudiyiva kai-kkollka.

Israayelin-koodaaratthil
Sleebaa thante rooshmaayaal mooshaa
Kaatthu janatthe-gorso sarppatthil ninnellaam
Bhraathaakkanmaare! Sleebaa-yaal naam
Dushdaathmaavin thee-yampil ninnum-nedenam raksha.
